entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 17.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 14. POP 30%
